About the Film:
Thomas Avery (Martin Sheen) is an American ophthalmologist who goes to France following the death of 
his adult son, Daniel (Emilio Estevez), killed in the Pyrenees during a storm while walking the 
Camino de Santiago (the Way of St. James), a Catholic pilgrimage route to the Cathedral of Santiago 
de Compostela in Galicia, Spain. 
Tom's purpose is initially to retrieve his son's body. However, in a combination of grief and 
homage to his son, Tom decides to walk the ancient spiritual trail where his son died, taking 
Daniel's ashes with him.


I hope you enjoy.
